intro: Psychotria rigescens, commonly known as the red psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, dark green leaves and clusters of small, white to pale pink flowers. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. Psychotria rigescens is also noted for its use in traditional medicine by indigenous communities.
